title: Regulation (EEC) No 1375/75 of the Commission of 29 May 1975 on the provisions of recognition of producer groups for hops in Ireland
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1375/75 OF THE COMMISSION  of 29 May 1975  on the provisions of recognition of producer groups for hops in Ireland
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Ireland, in derogation from Article 2 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 1351/72, a group of producers may be recognized if it is composed of at least three producers.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
